summary: The civil war is over. Skyrim is reunited. It's payback time! A great nord fleet has amassed and are ready to launch an assault on Carac Rellesel, a rebuilt Ayleid shore fortress, now controlled by the Thalmor. It's a work in progress, but still kind of playable. Update 1, done!
descriptionHtml:
First things first: CREDITS! In order to create this mod I have used:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23828 - Awesome Ayleid Building Resource Pack, made by Varlaisaran. This is also why this mod is kind of big.

If you feel like this mod is worth an endorsement, then you should give him one too :)
Seriously.
_____________________________________________________________________________________
New Update on the way! (uploading right now) Incl. Imperial version. Read the article for more info (It's kinda important).
________________________________________________________________________________________

Anyway, The civil war is over. Skyrim is reunited. It's payback time A great nord fleet has amassed and are ready to launch an assault on Carac Rellesel, a rebuilt Ayleid shore fortress, now controlled by the Thalmor Lord-General Gualtiero.

At the moment you can go there even if you haven't finished the civil war questline.

This mod adds:
-------------------
1. An oppourtunity to help or beat the crap out of the Thalmor.
2. More worldspaces:
*Carac Rellesel, the Thalmor Stronghold
*A Nord/Imperial Fleet (you won't be spending much time here, though.
3. Battles, barricades, blood and burning ships

Please note that this is sort of a rough sketch, a skeleton, a work in progress. Not finished.
It's still playable, though. Save before using this mod. Just to be on the safe side.

I've scrapped the join-the-Thalmor-part. Too much work, not enough time. Sorry.
Getting started:
----------------------
Stormcloak: There is a ship in the Windhelm docks called "The Berserker" (I've added a map marker). There's a hatch/trapdoor at the end of the ship. It will take you to the Nord fleet.

Imperial: There is a ship in the Solitude docks called "Discipline". Same as above.

__________________________________________________________________________________

Easy Installation:
--------------
SurSummerAssault.esp goes into your Skyrim/Data folder.
The folders Meshes/Textures also goes into your Skyrim/Data folder

The latest file (1.5) has everything you need.
_____________________________________________________________________________________
author: Surjamte
